title: Amazon React Cart Practice
content:
I recently built an Amazon React Cart with React and deployed it live. I'm still getting used to how to implement components and hooks to "react" fast. I think I'm going to practice and use react more often, as I practice more algorithms. 

https://amazon-cart-bk.netlify.app/

check em out!

title: My First Blog!
content:
I built this blog from scratch, using HTML, CSS, and Javascript. This blog is a full stack build, applying what I learned from my online class. I used Node JS to build REST API. Though this was a bit challenging implying basic knowledge to realistic build, I can't wait to build more cool apps and be a better developer in the future. I'm glad I can share my thoughts to the world!

Enjoy my personal blog, and let's reach for the sky!

P.S. make sure to read only, since this is my personal diary :)
